Title: Grot Shaman
Intro: A Grot Shaman is armed with a Shaman Stick.

Rules.Name: Wizard
Rules.Rule: WIZARD: This unit can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit can have a Giant Wolf mount that is armed with Slavering Jaws. If this unit has a Giant Wolf mount, it has a Move characteristic of 12" instead of 5".

Rules.Name: Kunnin’ (Or Just Lucky)
Rules.Rule: ABILITIESKunnin’ (or just Lucky): This unit has a ward of 5+.

Rules.Name: Sneaky Stabbin’
Rules.Rule: Sneaky Stabbin’ is a spell that has a casting value of 7 and a range of 16". If successfully cast, you can pick 1 friendly GROT unit within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to wound rolls for that unit until your next hero phase.
